questions.question:
What impact does UX have on monetary values?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Provides productivity gains and increases data quality.
Reduces the number of change requests and user errors.

questions.question:
What is the principle of SAP UX strategy?
Choose the correct answer.

What impact does SAP Fiori have on business?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Support the web and open standards

questions.question:
Which of the following are the current SAP UI Tools?
Choose the correct answers.

What are the current UI Technologies of SAP?
Choose the correct answers.

What are the goals of the SAPUI5 framework?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Provide a user interface technology for building and adapting client applications.
Provide a user interface technology for building and adapting server-based applications.
Provide a lightweight programming model for desktop only applications.
Provide an extensible framework for building desktop and mobile applications.

questions.question:
What are the SAP Fiori principles?
Choose the correct answers.

Which of the following steps are part of the discover phase in the DLD?
Choose the correct answers.

Which of the following steps are part of the design phase in the DLD?
Choose the correct answers.

What is the relation between the model and the controller in the standard MVC
implementation?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: The model notifies the controller about changes.
The controller sets the model visibility.

questions.question:
Which model types are supported by SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answers.

Which OData versions are currently supported by SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answers.

Which binding modes are supported by SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answers.

In which base class implementation is the setModel function implemented?
Choose the correct answers.

Which of the following are best practices when developing a SAPUI5 app?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Describe your app using a set of metadata.
Use the Synchronous Model Definition (SMD) syntax.
Minimize the code in the index.html file.
Use an asynchronous model definition in your JavaScript code.

questions.question:
What approach gives you the most flexibility for your SAPUI5 app?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: Implement complex UIs in the index.html file.

questions.question:
Which control is used in the index.html file to support letterboxing if required?
Choose the correct answer.

What configuration steps are necessary to define a navigation route?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Configure a route in the manifest.json file.
Assign at least one target to the route.

questions.question:
Why does it make sense to use the navigation API of SAPUI5 and concepts such as
eventbus or the navcontainer functions of the base application?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Using the navigation API, it is possible to use bookmarks.
The eventbus concept is deprecated and should no longer be used.
Using the navigation API, the configuration of routes and targets are clearly separated from the application implementation.
The NavContainer of the App object is not accessible inside a component-based app.

questions.question:
From which control does the sap.m.App control inherit navigation capabilities?
Choose the correct answer.

Is it true to say that the sap.m.App control does not provide responsive behavior?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: That is true, the sap.m.App control does not provide responsive behavior.
It depends on the SAPUI5 version. From version 1.30 and later, the sap.m.App control provides responsive behavior.
No, that is not true. The sap.m.App control provides responsive behavior.

questions.question:
What is the name of the aggregation of the sap.m.App control, or more precisely the name
of the sap.m.NavContainer control, in which UI controls are aggregated?
Choose the correct answer.

When is the use of a master-detail pattern not recommended?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: You need to offer complex filters for the master list of items.
You want to display a single object.
When you want to display different facets of the same object, data, or both.

questions.question:
Which modes are provided by the sap.m.SplitAppMode enumeration?
Choose the correct answers.

What are the two aggregations provided by sap.m.SplitApp control to add page
implementations?
Choose the correct answers.

What message types are known to SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answers.

How do you access the MessageManager?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: It is a singleton and can be accessed by the getMessageManager function on the core object.
You have to instantiate the MessageManager using the constructor function.
Each UI control provides a function to access the MessageManager.

questions.question:
In what configuration area of the manifest.json file can you activate automatic
message creation?
Choose the correct answer.

What layout control is used to achieve flexible and responsive layouts?
Choose the correct answer.

What aspects of the runtime environment can be accessed by the Device API of SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answers.

What are the different content densities provided by SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answers.

What is the best approach to showing a UI control on a desktop only, and not on a mobile
device?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: Use the Device API to check the environment and call setVisible on the UI control.
Use the UI control from sap.ui.commons. These UI controls can handle this automatically.
Use the standard CSS class sapUiVisibleOnlyOnDesktop.

questions.question:
You want to define a property with the name width to enhance a standard UI5 control.
The property should hold the current width of the UI control. What is the best approach to
defining the type of such a property?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: Define the property width of the type string.
Define the property width of the type sap.ui.core.Integer.
Define the property width of the type sap.ui.core.CSSSize.
Define the property width of the type sap.ui.core.type.CSSSize.

questions.question:
Which function must be called inside a control renderer to add the control ID to the DOM
tree and support eventing?
Choose the correct answer.

Which of the following statements are true with regard to implementing your own
renderer?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Implement the render function inside the control.
Implement a renderer class, derived from sap.ui.core.Renderer, in a separate file.
Implement the renderer using AMD syntax.
Assign a reference to the renderer property of the UI control.

questions.question:
Which of the following aspects are true for a SAPUI5 UI element?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: A UI element has an API.
A UI element does not have a renderer.
A UI element has a renderer.
A UI element can have events.

questions.question:
What is the base class for all UI controls in SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answer.

How can a renderer access the associated elements?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: The developer must implement an appropriate function to access the elements.
SAPUI5 provides functions to access all properties, associations, and aggregations.
The developer must define a property method in the control metadata and declare the access control.

questions.question:
Which file contains the initialization code for the UI library?
Choose the correct answer.

What method is called inside the library.js file?
Choose the correct answer.

Which of the following statements are true with respect to QUnit?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Supports only synchronous testing out of the box.
QUnit is a JavaScript unit and integration test framework.
Is capable of testing any generic JavaScript code.

questions.question:
Does QUnit support SAPUI5 view tests?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: Yes, you can implement a test class to test UI aspects of SAPUI5.
No, for UI tests you must use OPA5.
You can use the QUnit-extensions, called Selenium, to test SAPUI5 controls.

questions.question:
Which of the following statements are true with regard to OPA5?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Can be used for user interaction tests.
Can be used for SAPUI5 integration tests.
Is a view controller test framework.
Provides the possibility to test navigation.

questions.question:
When do you need to work with local data?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: When performance is poor in the productive system.
To perform a quick test without creating live entities on the back-end server.
When you want to reduce the complexity of your application.

questions.question:
What query option is needed to access the data of an entity in the JSON format?
Choose the correct answer.

Where is the best place to store local data when using the SAP Web IDE?
Choose the correct answers.

What class in the SAPUI5 API supports back-end mock up and is recommended by SAP?
Choose the correct answer.

What parameter is needed when instantiating a MockServer object?
Choose the correct answer.

What parameter must you provide when calling the simulate function of the mock
server?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: The full qualified path to the model and the URI for the service document.
The full qualified path to the local metadata file and the folder where the model data are stored locally.
The autoRespondAfter parameter and the full qualified path to the local metadata file.

questions.question:
What type of concurrency control is offered by OData?
Choose the correct answer.

How does the OData Model handle XSRF tokens?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: The OData Model does not handle XSRF-tokens. The developer must implement token handling.
The OData Model fetches the token when reading the metadata and sends the token automatically in each write request header.
The OData Model fetches the token for each request and sends the token automatically with each request.

questions.question:
What is returned by the function createEntry?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: The ID of the newly created entity.
A newly created object in JSON-format.

questions.question:
When do you use deep insert?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: When working with aggregation binding to update / insert an entity in the bound complex structure.
When adding a new entity to an entity set.
When working with hierarchical data where the data can only be stored in the full hierarchy.

questions.question:
What method must be implemented on the back end to support deep inserts?
Choose the correct answer.

Which function do you call on the ODataModel to trigger a deep insert?
Choose the correct answer.

What is the namespace in which the smart controls are bundled?
Choose the correct answer.

Which aggregation is used to overwrite the standard behavior of a SmartField control.
Choose the correct answer.

Which of the following statements are true for SAP Fiori elements?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Heavy UI coding is necessary when working with SAP Fiori Elements.
SAP Fiori elements provide designs for UI patterns and predefined templates.
Apps are based on OData services and annotations.

questions.question:
Which of the following describe benefits of SAP Fiori elements?
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: Full control of the of the generated code at design time.
Flexibility and freedom in UI design.

questions.question:
Which of the following SAP Fiori element based UIs are currently available?
Choose the correct answers.

Which UI annotation is used in the object page to display the object header?
Choose the correct answer.

Which UI annotation is used to declare a field for the smart filter template?
Choose the correct answer.

What is meant by the phrase ?SAPUI5 supports modification free enhancements??
Choose the correct answers.

answers.answer: The developer must create a copy of the application that should be enhanced and the enhancement is done in the copy.
The delivered standard application remains unchanged and hence the extension is considered to be modification free.
SAP provides a service in the cloud to generate an enhanced application using aspect-oriented programming.

questions.question:
Is it possible to add an extension point in the component implementation?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: It depends on the type of component.

questions.question:
To what namespace is the ExtensionPoint class assigned?
Choose the correct answer.

What types of extensions/replacements are supported by SAPUI5?
Choose the correct answers.

When you implement a controller extension and you implement the onInit and
onAfterRendering functions in the extension, when are they called?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: After the corresponding functions form the standard controller.
Only the functions of the controller extensions are called.
Before the corresponding functions from the standard controller.

questions.question:
How is the extension type called to hide UI controls?
Choose the correct answer.

Which of the following best describes a commit?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: With every commit, GIT create a new branch.
With every commit, GIT takes a snapshot of the current state of the underlying files.
With every commit, a new local repository is created.
A commit in GIT is a local operation.

questions.question:
Which of the following are the main states of a file in GIT?
Choose the correct answers.

In which state are the files in GIT when a remote repository is cloned?
Choose the correct answers.

What is the result of a GIT Reset?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: Removes all untracked files from the working directory.
Returns a project back to the previous state.

questions.question:
What is the result of a GIT Revert?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: Removes all untracked files from the working directory.
Reverts back to the previous state of the project.

questions.question:
What is the result of a GIT Clean?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: Removes all untracked files from the working directory.
Reverts back to the previous state of the project.

questions.question:
What is a GIT branch?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: A GIT branch represents a local working copy of the main development line.
A GIT branch always represents the main development line.
A GIT branch represents an independent line of development.
A GIT branch is the SAP implementation of GIT.

questions.question:
Which of the following statements are true about the merge functionality in GIT?
Choose the correct answer.

answers.answer: A merge deletes the content of a branch.
Allows the merging of two local branches into one local branch.
Allows integration of a branch into another branch.
